item.description:

item.title: LiKe BuTTeR: 'Star Wars Battlefront: Bespin DLC! First Impressions.'
item.description:
Here are my first imperssions of the brand new "Bespin" expansion for Star Wars Battlefront. I have to say, I'm impressed with the way it looks and how fun the game is. However, I can't help to feel like we are still getting a bit ripped off for the price of what the season pass was at launch. I do think the game is going in the right direction though. Be sure to drop a LIKE if you enjoyed! Thank you!

Cheap Games for PC! http://www.cdkeys.com/?mw_aref=likebutter

item.title: LiKe BuTTeR: 'One Shot, One Kill (PvP) SNIPER BUILD! (The Division)'
item.description:
Here is my sniper build that is made specifically to one or two shot players but still have the ability to hip fire spam close range if necessary. You can also do this build with a bolt action sniper if you want. But I prefer the M1A because it gives more options as a player. Feel free to share any changes you made to the build in the comment section below! Thank you!

item.title: TED: 'My journey from Marine to actor | Adam Driver'
item.description:
Before he fought in the galactic battles of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, Adam Driver was a United States Marine with 1/1 Weapons Company. He tells the story of how and why he became a Marine, the complex transition from soldier to civilian — and Arts in the Armed Forces, his nonprofit that brings theater to the military. Because, as he says: "Self-expression is just as valuable a tool as a rifle on your shoulder." Followed by a spirited performance of Marco Ramirez's "I am not Batman" by Jesse J. Perez and Matt Johnson. (Adult language)

TEDTalks is a daily video podcast of the best talks and performances from the TED Conference, where the world's leading thinkers and doers give the talk of their lives in 18 minutes (or less). Look for talks on Technology, Entertainment and Design -- plus science, business, global issues, the arts and much more.

Find closed captions and translated subtitles in many languages at http://www.ted.com/translate

Follow TED news on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/tednews

Like TED on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TED

Subscribe to our channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/TEDtalksDirector

item.title: TED: 'How barbershops can keep men healthy | Joseph Ravenell'
item.description:
The barbershop can be a safe haven for black men, a place for honest conversation and trust — and, as physician Joseph Ravenell suggests, a good place to bring up tough topics about health. He's turning the barbershop into a place to talk about medical problems that statistically affect black men more often and more seriously, like high blood pressure. It's a new approach to problem solving with broad applications. "What is your barbershop?" he asks. "Where is that place for you where people affected by a unique problem can meet a unique solution?"

TEDTalks is a daily video podcast of the best talks and performances from the TED Conference, where the world's leading thinkers and doers give the talk of their lives in 18 minutes (or less). Look for talks on Technology, Entertainment and Design -- plus science, business, global issues, the arts and much more.

item.title: Looper: 'Finding Dory Easter Eggs You Missed'
item.description:
If you're new, Subscribe! → http://bit.ly/subscribe-to-looper

You can't have a good Pixar movie without a bunch of Easter eggs, right? There are more than a few to spot in Finding Dory, the long-awaited 2016 sequel to Finding Nemo. Let's dive in and find out what you might have missed during the movie. And it should go without saying, but there are ​spoilers ahead​...

Darla strikes back? | 0:18

Wired | 0:46

A113 | 1:19

The Pizza Planet Truck rides again | 1:43

Wall-E calendar | 2:02

Herbie the Love Bug | 2:24

Ride reminder | 2:51

Return of the Tank Gang | 3:16

Hank, the greatest Easter egg of them all | 3:39

Website → http://looper.com/

Like us → https://facebook.com/loopermoviestv/

Follow us → https://twitter.com/looper

Instagram → https://instagram.com/looperhq/

Vine → https://vine.co/looperhq

Looper is the go-to source for the movies, TV shows and video games we all love. We're addicted to all things superhero and Star Wars, but we're not afraid to binge watch some reality TV when the mood strikes. Whether it's revealing Easter eggs and secrets hidden in your favorite films, exposing movie mistakes, highlighting the best deleted scenes, or uncovering the truth about reality TV's strangest stars, Looper has endless entertainment for the discerning YouTube viewer.
